TEXT.TITLE: CIE FINANCIERE DE PARIBAS <PARI.PA> 1986 YEAR
TEXT.BODY: Parent company net profit 385 mln francs vs 226.9 mln Dividend five francs vs no comparison Note - The financial and banking group was privatised by the government in January this year. Reuter
